rows.label: tev006201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Our people are now allies. And yet, I suspect there
are those among you who will not so readily trust us
after our involvement with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006201_MSG0002
rows.name:
To demonstrate our new loyalties, I have assigned
a number of my fellow Wrothians to live in your city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006201_MSG0003
rows.name:
They are unlikely to impress you with their social skills,
but their arms are strong and true. Should your city
require their strength, you need only to ask it of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Ga Buidhe is among the nimblest warriors in our
band of mercenaries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006201_MSG0005
rows.name:
And yet she is absolutely effusive in her praise of the
warrior you call "Elma."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006201_MSG0006
rows.name:
She claims that despite fighting many campaigns on
many worlds, she has never seen a warrior move with
such effortless grace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006201_MSG0007
rows.name:
I yearn to challenge this warrior to single combat,
so that I might see for myself what it is that makes
her exceptional.[ST:wait ]
